projects.title: Audiophile Store
projects.description: This is an e-commerce project challenge provided by a frontend mentor with content, responsive design for all device in the format of Sketch and Figma. The project built with Nextjs and Contentful by generating dynamic site.
projects.alt: A image showing audiophile store e-commerce landing page project preview

projects.title: Task Management
projects.description: The kanban task management is a full-stack project challenge provided by a frontend mentor with all design. Users can create, read, update, and delete multiple boards by assigning progression columns with tasks and subtasks.
projects.alt: A image showing  kanban task management landing page project preview

projects.title: GardenJS
projects.description: GardenJs is a full-stack game project where the users build a garden and feed rabbits by solving javascript questions. Users are limited to max five questions a day and can level up only by solving at least three questions correctly.
projects.alt: A image showing gardenjs project preview

projects.title: Postcard
projects.description: This is 5 days of hackday MERN project. You can create a digital post card to save in database.
projects.alt: A image showing postcard send platform landing page project preview

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer

experience.title: Entrepreneur

profile.about:
I embarked on my academic journey in the field of electricity and electronics, completing a two-year program in Turkey. I then went on to obtain my bachelor's degree in electrical engineering from Hungary. After graduation, I established a company and spent two years working in international business. Later, I ventured into a startup project in agriculture solutions, where my primary responsibilities included business planning and relationship management. 

Around two years ago, I made a career shift and decided to pursue software development. I dedicated myself to honing my skills in both front-end and back-end development over the next year. My front-end proficiencies encompassed Javascript, HTML, CSS, and the associated ecosystem, including React, Redux, and SASS. In parallel, I attained comprehensive experience with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Mongoose in the back-end. 

I then completed an exhaustive three-month full-stack Javascript training program at the School of Applied Technology, </ Salt> company. The program covered web standards, the software industry, mob programming, the TDD approach, working agile methods, and several other languages and frameworks, including Typescript, Next.js, Contentful, SQL, GraphQL, Docker, AWS, and more. 

Post-training, I secured a one-year contract as a full-stack developer, contributing to a front-end project that utilized Next.js, Contentful, and several other third-party technologies. Additionally, I built various weekly projects as part of the post-graduate program.

Overall, my diverse experiences have provided me with a unique perspective and skill set that I bring to my current role as a full-stack software developer.
